headline: Ball (BALL): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q2 Earnings?
summary: Ball has been treading water for the past six months, recording a small loss of 3.6% while holding steady at $48.96. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 15.5% gain during that period.
